abstract: Golfer Rickie Fowler is four shots back of lead at TPC Boston golf tournament; Charley Hoffman holds lead with 12 under, 63.
lead_paragraph: Fowler, ranked ninth in the world, was at eight under, four strokes behind Charley Hoffman, who produced Saturday’s low score, a nine-birdie, one-bogey 63.

headline.main: Rickie Fowler, at Four Shots Back, Relishes Thrill of the Chase
headline.print_headline: Fowler, at Four Shots Back, Relishes Thrill of the Chase

snippet: Fowler, ranked ninth in the world, was at eight under, four strokes behind Charley Hoffman, who produced Saturday’s low score, a nine-birdie, one-bogey 63.
